about.heading: About us
about.subtitle: Your specialist in accordion, button accordion and music since 2001
about.description: LM Studio & Music Service is your specialist in accordion, button accordion and music technical services since 2001. We offer everything from sales and service to recording, PA rental and digitalization.
about.valueProp1Desc: Direct import, low costs and warranty on used instruments.
about.valueProp2Desc: Everything from sales and service to courses, studio and sound engineering – we offer it all under one roof.
about.valueProp3Desc: We adapt our services to your wishes and needs.
about.industryDescription: LM Studio & Music Service is registered as an official Norwegian workshop for accordion and diatonic accordion repair and maintenance services.
about.storySection1Text: In 2001, Geir-Harry Haugland established LM Studio & Music Service, with experience as an accordion player and technical knowledge in sound engineering.
about.storySection2Text: From the first recordings in 2002, we have produced music for artists from all over the country and developed the workshop into a competence center for repair and maintenance of all types of accordions.
about.storySection3Text: We combine technical expertise with musical understanding. As musicians ourselves, we understand what the instrument means to you, and give the same personal follow-up to everyone.
about.teamGeirBio: Accordion player, sound engineer and course instructor. Specialist in accordions and button accordions, studio, service and PA.
about.teamEvaBio: Contributes in studio, CD design and copying.
